long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tipp is an app that let's you create personalized podcasts, based on the articles you want to read (but never actually have the time for). This Chrome extension is the companion to your application (Android/iOS/web) to share your to-read articles to your account.

Just log in to the extension with your regular Tipp credentials, and start sharing the web pages and articles to your own account.

Head over to https://tipp.so to get started !
